vclaim: Sen. David Perdue advised attendees to offer up an ominous prayer aimed at President Obama during the 2016 Faith & Freedom Coalition’s Road to Majority conference.
title: David Perdue Death Prayer
subtitle: Sen. David Perdue caused controversy by saying of President Obama to "pray for him like Psalms 109:8 says: Let his days be few, and let another have his office."
author: Kim LaCapria
